CoronaViz.org: A directory of COVID-19 data visualization

Informationssammlung zum Thema CoVid-19

Umfassende Linksammlung von Dashboards, Lageinformationen, Checklisten. Außerdem Links zu Diagnostik-Themen und Erlassen der Länder.

Datawrapper: live visualizations about the coronavirus, for you to use

More than 20 charts, maps and tables that show the latest numbers about the coronavirus.

Vox: 11 charts that explain the coronavirus pandemic

Overview of good graphs showing cases, symptoms, comparisons by country, and more.
Made by Thomas Puppe. Available on GitHub. Icon by svgrepo.
